title: VR-Based Film and Television Animation (FTA) Production Education Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic experience with design software and foundational understanding of animation principles
context.additional_context: A blended learning environment focused on hands-on practice using VR equipment and 3D graphic tools.

learning_goals: Learners can perform 3D animation modeling processes with over 80% accuracy in a VR environment.
Learners can create FTA content prototypes using real-time 3D graphic production technology.
Learners can plan and implement interactive animation scenarios using VR-based storytelling techniques.
Learners can improve the completeness of their work by over 20% through peer assessment in a VR educational environment

resources: VR Headset and Motion Controller Set
GPU Equipment for Real-Time Rendering Tasks

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
